comment.body: 正體字唔算廣東人嘅文字，起碼正體字加粵字。語文老師打壓，係擔憂普通話教學？第啲老師费事理講廣東話？重有語文老師其實唔該打壓，教詩詞平仄、入聲，粵語勝普通話幾籌。

Use plain JavaScript or anything compiled to JavaScript. Viewers host your site so you need to use a programming language viewers have. What does viewer have? JavaScript and Python. ZeroNet site cannot call Python directly currently for security reasons. So the only choice left is JavaScript (and languages compiled to it, such as CoffeeScript, TypeScript, Closure, Kotlin, Ceylon, etc). In future, if someone managed to implement a sandboxed Python ZeroSite API (and got it merged to ZeroNet), you can also use Python.

@Alex: Have you read [the official ZeroFram API doc](https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/zeroframe_api_reference/) ?  If you are new to CoffeeScript, use `coffee -c` to compile those examples to JavaScript.
Private site is a planned feature AFAIK.
